column4: So if I delete the folder in the dir of where I installed hplip-2.8.5 it will uninstall it?
dose there is an optionin that box to allow you to see what you type in the pass field
yep.  and i've correctly entered the right passphrase
hang on one sec.   i managed to see sometihng different, its asking me to create a "Default Keyring" what ever that means
btw, did i thank you for your attention to my question :>
as corny/noobie as it sounds, i'm actually making notes right now.  I like to document these things
it is asking me to create a password for the keyring, should that be my network key to my wireless network?  What exactly is a keyring?

okay, i guess the password its asking me to create is a password for the keyring, so with that password, i have access to all the passwords associated with other wireless networks (or passwords to access various programs too, perhaps??)

Yay, it worked i have internet.  Man.. i have so much to do tonight.  I'll prolly need to stay up all night.  Install it on my laptop shouldn't take long.  I still gotta install ubuntu on my desktop.  The sh*tty part is, gutsy doesn't support my wireless network usb adapter, I think that'll take me sometime to figure out
anyways, i got internet now on my laptop thats a good start.  thx dude.  may need your help with my desktop later if you still around
i'm installing gutsy right now, is hardy another ubuntu release?
do u (and can I) want me to add you on instant messenger or something?
in that case, i might as well download hardy heron.  are you on msn?
I got this usb wireless adapter by TP-LINK.  I hope Hardy supports it
u gotsta bounce?  aight dude, thx so much for your help.  Can i add you on msn (grimlock838@gmail.com)??
